definition: foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks

sentences.english: Officials standing off-court are not allowed to make foot fault calls.
sentences.chinese: 官方人員不在場上是不能夠進行腳誤的判罰的。

sentences.english: However, to call foot faults the official must be standing on-court for the match.
sentences.chinese: 但是，喊腳誤的人員必須正式在場上。
